name: Fried Rice
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion and minced garlic. Saut√© until fragrant and onions are translucent.
Add diced carrot and cook until slightly tender.
Push the vegetables to one side of the pan and pour the beaten eggs onto the other side. Scramble the eggs until cooked.
Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir to combine with the vegetables and eggs.
Drizzle soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil over the rice. Stir well to coat evenly.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with sliced green onions before serving.
